headline: Co-Founder at Sqouts | Assistant Professor at Universitas Indonesia | Co-Founder, Ex-COO, Product at Pahamify
summary: I am an experienced educator, startup founder, and company executive with expertise in machine vision, pedagogy, and product management. I have experience building products from zero to millions of users, leading cross-functional teams of various sizes, and managing company-wide initiatives. I hold a Ph.D. in computer engineering with a focus on machine learning and machine vision from the National University of Singapore (NUS). Besides education and product management, I’m also passionate about parenting, running, and rock climbing.

experiences.title: Co-Founder
experiences.description: I am a co-founder at Sqouts where we help companies hire and build their optimal teams through the use of conversational AI.

experiences.title: Entrepreneur in Residence
experiences.description: I am part of Antler's ID3 entrepreneur-in-residence program. During this period, we developed Kinna, an AI copilot for parents and caregivers in Indonesia.

experiences.title: Co-Founder, Chief Operating Officer
experiences.description:
Pahamify is a leading education technology startup in Indonesia backed by Y Combinator. As Chief Operating Officer (2020 - 2022), I oversaw the company's day-to-day operations and ensured that we met our strategic objectives. In addition to leading the product and academic teams, I was also responsible for leading the sales and marketing teams. My key accomplishments in this role include:

● Developed high-level company goals and objectives that aligned with the company’s and founders’ overall vision and mission, and communicated these goals to the whole organization.
● Establishing and monitoring company objectives and key results (OKRs) to keep all teams aligned (annually and quarterly). 
● Developing high-level marketing & sales strategy to ensure growth in our customer base. Our revenue grew 3x YoY during this period.
● Developed a product and educational content strategy that aligned with the company’s overall goals. Pahamify became the leading online college test prep platform in Indonesia during this period by the number of online test sessions.

experiences.title: Co-Founder, Chief Product Officer
experiences.description:
Pahamify is a leading education technology startup in Indonesia backed by Y Combinator. As Chief Product Officer at Pahamify, I was responsible for driving the company's product strategy and ensuring the successful delivery of our products to market. My key accomplishments in this role include:

● Developing a product vision and strategy that aligns with the company's overall goals and objectives, and communicating this vision to the broader organization.
● Building and managing a high-performing product team, including product managers, UI designers and UX researchers, and fostering a culture of innovation and collaboration. 
● Building and managing a high-performing academic and creative team, including teachers, content writers, and creatives (illustrators, animators, videographers). I lead the development of more than 30,000+ educational videos and content accessible through the learning app.
● Leading the successful launch of several products (mobile and web app) that spanned three large product areas: self-paced online learning, online live classes, and an adaptive college test preparation platform. These products help establish Pahamify as a top online college test preparation platform in Indonesia.
● Collaborating closely with cross-functional teams, including engineering, sales, marketing, and customer success, to ensure that our products are meeting the needs of our customers and driving business growth.

experiences.title: Co-Founder, Executive Producer
experiences.description:
Hujan Tanda Tanya is a leading Indonesian educational video channel on YouTube with over 500,000 subscribers.

● From 2016 - 2018, I was involved in the full-stack content creator process: pre-production (writing), production (camerawork, lighting, sound), post-production (video editing, animation, illustration), and publishing (thumbnail design, metadata, platform integration).
● In 2018, I transitioned to executive producer focused on securing partnerships with brands. Examples include content and endorsement deals with Google, Cambly, Nutrifood, and Kormo Jobs.

experiences.title: Graduate Teaching Assistant
experiences.description:
I was a teaching assistant at NUS, teaching and aiding in module development for several courses in the field of Control, Intelligent Systems, and Robotics. These courses include:

● Modelling of Mechatronic Systems
● Control Systems Design And Simulation
● Industrial Control Systems

experiences.title: Business Analyst
experiences.description: Developed an activity-based budgeting model for a company working in the mining industry. The model helped improve alignment between departments and reduce unnecessary spending in operational expenses.
